column2: colnames(table)[4] = "p"; table$p = as.numeric(table$p); table$p = ifelse(as.numeric(table$p) < 0.05,paste("" ,sprintf("%.3f",table$p), ""), paste("" ,sprintf("%.3f",table$p), "")) # highlight p < 0.05
table$p = ifelse(table$p == ' 0.000 ', "\u003C 0.001", table$p)
kbl(caption ="Mediation Analysis: DV = Weight loss, IV = Intervention", escape=F) %>%
